welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Moreland, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, where all commercial flights operate from.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, used for military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and Lufthansa.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and is home to United Airlines.

wifi.note: This network is available throughout the airport and does not require a password.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
